channel.title: comic on The Blag
channel.description: Recent content in comic on The Blag

item.title: Losing Things
item.description: Some very beautiful things get lost and forgotten. Just as I got lost. - Luise Rainer We all lose things all the time, sometimes they are simple things such as an eraser, but many a times we lose significant things. I created this graph to plot the relation between how hard it is to loose something and how much hurt we feel when the thing is lost! Enjoy! (And probably share if you like it)

item.title: XKCD
item.description: Some of the best XKCDs, there are many more at : xkcd.com PS: Its my favorite webcomic! Angular Size Ancient Stars Altitude Approximations Beliefs Compass and Straightedge Complex Conjugate Convincing Creepy #RelatableAF
